tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_subject_requests (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  request_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  request_date DATE NOT NULL,
  data_subject_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  data_subject_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  data_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  request_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE access_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id INT,
    request_date DATE,
    request_type VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE access_request_details (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id INT,
    requested_data TEXT,
    request_status TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_subject_id) REFERENCES data_subjects_request(request_id)
);

CREATE TABLE correction_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id INT,
    correction_data TEXT,
    request_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_subject_id) REFERENCES data_subjects_request(request_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deletion_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id INT,
    deletion_reason TEXT,
    request_date TIMESTAMP,
    request_status TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_subject_id) REFERENCES data_subjects_request(request_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_subjects (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE information_access_requests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id UUID NOT NULL,
    request_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Pending'
)

CREATE TABLE correction_requests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id UUID NOT NULL,
    request_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Pending'
)

CREATE TABLE deletion_requests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_subject_id UUID NOT NULL,
    request_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Pending'
)

CREATE TABLE request_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    request_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    request_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    request_details TEXT
)
